snippet: A British station broadcast what appeared to be a recording of Rupert Murdoch criticizing the police investigation of Britain’s phone hacking scandal as “totally incompetent.”
abstract: Media tycoon Rupert Murdoch faces new questions after television broadcast of what appears to be clandestine recording of him criticizing police investigation of Britain's phone hacking scandal as 'totally incompetent'.
lead_paragraph: A British station broadcast what appeared to be a recording of Rupert Murdoch criticizing the police investigation of Britain’s phone hacking scandal as “totally incompetent.”

headline.main: On Tape, Murdoch Criticizes Hacking Inquiry, Broadcaster Says
headline.print_headline: On Tape, Murdoch Criticizes Hacking Inquiry, Broadcaster Says
